item.title: Docker Context to Manage Remote Docker
item.description: This guide shows how contexts make it easy for a single Docker CLI to manage multiple Swarm clusters, multiple Kubernetes clusters, and multiple individual Docker nodes.

item.title: Enable Docker Remote Api on Docker Host
item.description: Docker engine has inbuild API service that allows you to control & modify your docker engine and docker instance using HTTP.
